description.message: Cast a Twitch stream to the Twitched Roku app.

message_cast_success.message: Casted the $1 stream to the Twitched app.

message_cast_fail.message: Failed to cast the $1 stream to the Twitched app.

message_find_stream_fail.message: Failed to find a live stream on the page.
message_find_stream_fail.description: No live stream was found. Should happen on a VOD or page that does not have a stream.

message_ip_not_set.message: A Roku IP is not set.
message_ip_not_set.description: Message shown if a deep link action is tried without an IP set.

message_failed_set_ip.message: Failed to set Roku IP/hostname. Make sure the Roku is on and the IP/hostname is correct.

message_setting_ip.description: Message shown when IP is saving

message_roku_conntect_fail.message: Failed to connect to the Roku.

message_cast_in_progress.message: Attempting to cast to the Twitched app.
message_cast_in_progress.description: Notification message shown when a stream is attempting to be cast
